# WX

## Installation
```html
...
<head>
<script type="text/javascript" src="wx.min.js"></script>
<link rel="stylesheet" href="wx.min.css" >
</head>
...
```

## Dependencies

* <a href="http://jquery.com/" target="_blank">jQuery 1.8.x+</a>
